events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to receiving an incorrect item.
Support agent Jessica has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand your order issue and will assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 789456123, and I have attached a clear picture showing the item I got instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3 to 5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and am satisfied with the refund solution you proposed.
The refund has been processed, and you will receive a confirmation email shortly. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I have received the refund successfully. Thank you very much for your help.
We are closing the case now as the refund was completed and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback on the support experience.
